REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2392 reute r f BC-LTV-<QLTV>-UNIT-WINS 04-01 0065

TEXT.TITLE: LTV <QLTV> UNIT WINS AIR FORCE CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: LTV Corp's LTV Missiles and Electronics Group said it received a 28.3 mln dlr contract from the U.S. Air Force for continued design and development of an anti-satellite weapon system. The company said the contract work will be performed at its facilities in Grand Prairie, Texas, and is expected to be completed by September. Reuter
